AERGO And Crypto.com: Dynamic RSS Feeds

AERGO‚Äôs RSS Feed Integrated With Crypto.com Price Page AERGO Is Not Only Listed On Crypto.com, But Its RSS Feed Will Be Integrated As Well Introduction: Integration With Crypto.com: As AERGO‚Äôs News Expands AERGO is excited to announce that Crypto.com will integrate AERGO‚Äôs RSS Feed into Aergo (AERGO) Price Page, expanding the viewership of all news, price data and innovation surr

AERGO‚Äôs RSS Feed Integrated With Crypto.com Price Page

AERGO Is Not Only Listed On Crypto.com, But Its RSS Feed Will Be Integrated As Well

Introduction: Integration With Crypto.com: As AERGO‚Äôs News Expands

AERGO is excited to announce that Crypto.com will integrate AERGO‚Äôs RSS Feed into Aergo (AERGO) Price Page, expanding the viewership of all news, price data and innovation surrounding the AERGO project. This feature will enable users who utilize the Crypto.com platform to seamlessly garner the latest news and developments in real time surrounding AERGO, the Hybrid Blockchain Behemoth. Crypto.com users can stay in the loop surrounding the latest updates regarding AERGO‚Äôs products and services in addition to access to the latest AERGO price, trading volume, live charts and market capitalization data. Transparency is incumbent for the success of any cryptocurrency or blockchain platform, and this is a massive step in garnering mainstream attention from the Crypto.com community as a whole.

This Announcement Follows The Listing Of AERGO On Crypto.com Earlier This Year, A Major Feat For AERGO

As not only a leading exchange within the realm of blockchain, but an extremely influential company surrounding the mainstream adoption of cryptocurrency, Crypto.com has created numerous multi-million dollar campaign initiatives, perpetuating the expansion of blockchain to a massive audience. These initiatives include commercials with renowned actor Matt Damon, the acquisition and rebranding from the Staples Center to the Crypto.com Arena and multitudes of billboard campaigns in some of the world‚Äôs largest metropolitan centers.

About Crypto.com

Founded in 2016, Crypto.com has grown into a full-fledged and well-known international cryptocurrency hub in just six years. Its crypto ecosystem consists of an assortment of different products and services which include Crypto.com App, Crypto.com Exchange, Crypto.com DeFi Wallet, DeFi Swap, Crypto.com Visa Cards, Crypto Earn, Crypto Credit, Price Page, NFT marketplace, Ethereum Gas Fees Tracker, and many other services. Crypto.com works with regulatory institutions and enterprises throughout the world and their vision is to bring you the most convenient way to buy, sell, trade, and spend cryptocurrencies. The Crypto.com App allows users to buy over 100 top cryptocurrencies at true cost, to earn high interest on their crypto, to manage their Crypto.com Visa Card, and to easily make crypto payments, along with many other outstanding features that reward their user base. The company‚Äôs Crypto.com DeFi Wallet is non-custodial, so users can have full control of their private keys.

Crypto.com is a highly secure and regulated crypto platform with numerous security certifications and assessments awarded by top security auditors within the realm of blockchain technology. Crypto.com has obtained the following certificates.

‚óè ISO/IEC 27001:2013, ISO/IEC 27701:2019, PCI:DSS 3.2.1, Level 1 compliance and CCSS.

‚óè ISO/IEC 27701:2019 Certification for privacy risk management by SGS.

‚óè ISO/IEC 27001:2013 Certification for information security management by Bureau Veritas.

‚óè Level 1 (highest degree) PDC:DSS standard for complying with strict requirements in the payment card industry.

‚óè CCSS (Cryptocurrency Security Standard)‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääa series of strict security requirements for storing, accepting, and transacting cryptocurrencies.

‚óè Adaptive (Tier 4) rating‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäNational Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) Privacy Framework

‚óè Adaptive (Tier 4) rating‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäNational Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) Cybersecurity Framework

About AERGO: The Hybrid Blockchain Platform Paving The Way Throughout The Globe

The Blockchain Created For The World

AERGO is an open-source hybrid blockchain platform centered around the creation of blockchain business solutions and decentralized applications built on the AERGO platform: a high speed and scalable infrastructure based blockchain paradigm for all enterprises, large and small. AERGO aims to improve enterprise efficiency and enable businesses to create vast new opportunities for both public and private projects. AERGO utilizes the Lua smart contract language with a one second block time and extremely low transaction fees. AERGO also boasts a net-zero carbon emission output, making it one of the most environmentally friendly blockchain platforms in the cryptocurrency sphere. AERGO supports SQL, over fifty enterprise clients and has over forty use cases as of 2022. Investors include, but are not limited to, Sequoia Capital, Dekrypt Capital, Arrington XRP Capital, FBG Capital, Connect Capital and many more! AERGO has also been listed on the most prominent cryptocurrency exchange trading platforms which include Coinbase, Binance, Kucoin, Crypto.com and Upbit. The AERGO platform also has its own native AERGO token.

The AERGO token is the main means of exchange on the AERGO platform. AERGO tokens can be utilized in a variety of different ways, enhancing the function and value of the platform as a whole. AERGO tokens can be used to deploy smart contracts, staking and paying for services that exist on the AERGO platform. The AERGO platform where the native token exists is built and utilized by Blocko, the Samsung-backed South Korean blockchain technology company that has deployed production blockchain solutions for large-scale clients including Lotte Card, Shinhan Bank, Korea Exchange, Hyundai Motors, and many more.

Through the integration of AERGO‚Äôs news updates with Crypto.com‚Äôs Price Page, users can stay up to date with AERGO‚Äôs price history, price ticker, market capitalization and much more!

Conclusion: An Enterprise Hybrid Blockchain, Enterprise Level Mainstream Awareness

AERGO‚Äôs RSS Feed On Crypto.com Enables The Platform To Garner A Brand New Audience

It is evident that, in 2022, AERGO has made massive strides to increase the overall awareness of their platform to new users within the realm of blockchain and to traditional enterprises. Within cryptocurrency, we have seen this through recent developments surrounding AERGO‚Äôs token listing on Coinbase and Crypto.com; in addition, we now see that AERGO‚Äôs RSS Feed will be integrated into Crypto.com. This is a massive feat that will assist in the expansion of AERGO as a whole!

Disclaimer: cryptocurrency involves substantial risk, do not invest more than you can afford to lose!

But finding the right balance between security and usability has traditionally been challenging and required compromise. However, this is changing.

Company News A Self-Authenticating Social Protocol Bluesky

In law, a ‚Äúself-authenticating‚Äù document requires no extrinsic evidence of authenticity. In computer science, an ‚Äúauthenticated data structure‚Äù can have its operations independently verifiable. When resources in a network can attest to their own authenticity, then that data is inherently live ‚Äì that is, canonical and transactable ‚Äì no matter where it is located.

Pairwise Trust: A New Blockchain-Based Identification Solution for Web3 Infrastructures Sovereign Wallet 

In MetaMUI, users can create their own DID by submitting their personal information(KYC) to one of the Sidechain Operators, and the operator will decide whether approving or denying the request depending on the status of the submitted data. Once the request is approved, the user‚Äôs personal data get hashed, and the hashed data is safely stored in the user‚Äôs device.

19:25 • 13 days ago

Continuum Loop Inc.

Webinar Recording ‚Äì Exploring Digital ID

The post Webinar Recording ‚Äì Exploring Digital ID appeared first on Continuum Loop Inc..

Continuum Loop Exploring Digital ID

Christine and Darrell would like to thank everyone who participated in the Exploring Digital ID webinar on April 27th, 2022. This was an excellent opportunity to learn more about how Self-sovereign identity (digital id) will affect our lives. Here is a breakdown of what happened and some key takeaways for attendees and those who couldn‚Äôt make it.

Webinar Recording PDF of the presentation

Christine started the webinar by talking about a real-world travel scenario where we can easily envision moving from a physical to a digital wallet with a digital id. In her scenario, Christine walked us through each step of the trip. From booking and boarding to networking, she explains how a widely adopted digital id system can make the travel process more secure, saving time and hassle, making the entire experience more seamless. Darrell finished it off by sharing his hopes to one day see a wallet agent that will be able to assemble and organize records/receipts for you based on your activity.

Distributed Ledger (Blockchain) Security Explainer

For our second part of the webinar [8:45], we wanted to debunk some of the myths about digital id. There has been a lot of misinformation, and we wanted to clear up a few things that we thought were important. We talked about centralization vs. decentralization, SSI exposing your demons, surveillance, and compelled behaviour.

Worried About Digital ID? Governments must fight misinformation on digital ID, say provincial experts A Day in the Life of Your Data Visualization showing how PayPal shares your data. If PayPal, a highly regulated and respected payment provider, looks like this, what do the less-regulated/unregulated folks look like?

Darrell wrapped it up by pointing out a few trends shifting with Proof of Human; a severe KYC issue in the DeFi ecosystem that needs to be addressed by the Decentralized Exchanges (DEX); and Hyperledger Aries & AnonCreds.

QUESTIONS!?

There were some great questions sent in, we really value and appreciate your engagement! Our Question Period started at about 32:00. Here is a rundown of what we covered:

How do I use AnonCreds but support WC3?  What is the trend with Trust Registries? How far are we from full sovereign data ownership? Thoughts on government‚Äôs place in the digital wallet market eIDAS 2.0: How Europe can define the digital identity blueprint for the world The Wallet Report ‚Äì 2021 Update We will update with the ToIP blog mentioned once its posted.

Thanks again to everyone who participated. We hope that we were able to help you understand the benefits of adopting a Self-sovereign identity to take control of your digital world. Visit our blog, follow us on social media, and subscribe to our newsletter to stay up to date and learn more about decentralized identity.

Join the SSI Crew!

The first step on your journey to understanding Decentralized Identity and taking control of your own digital world.

You're in the Crew!

Name

Email

Subscribe

Follow Follow Follow Follow

The post Webinar Recording ‚Äì Exploring Digital ID appeared first on Continuum Loop Inc..

15:31 • 13 days ago
